Github Repositories

Below are some of my repositories with their UI and code.

This website allows users to create account, login and post a blog. User information and Posts are stored in the postgreSQL database and displayed on a paginated UI.
The website was built using Python(Flask) on both front and back end and the UI enhanced using SASS. The app is deployed to Render

View Repository UI Github repo

This webpage is a content ap. It receives posts from a fake rest API and displays them on a paginated UI. You can add, update and delete posts. It is similar to the one below only that it was built entirely with a framework. Check out their differences in their respective Github Repositories. It was built using React JS Framework

View Repository UI Github repo

An webpage that allows user to input
food item and its calories and display the information
on the interface. It also displays the total amount of calories.
Built using Vanilla JS(IIFEs), HTML and CSS

View Repository UI Github repo

This is a small car race project
built using JQuery, HTML and CSS3
